name: Slide To Survive (HamsterDogg55)
description:
This was made in 1 week for the 3rd Blackthornprod Game Jam.

The theme was "Less is more"

In this game, the less moves and deaths you take, the more points you will amass.

Controls: WASD

If you have the Time, I would love some feedback on my level design. This is my first puzzle game, and I would love some feedback. Thanks!
